name: NIH reviews
description: Reviewer scores of different subsets of 48 NIH grant proposals from this paper: https://psyarxiv.com/r2xvb
citation: Forscher, P. S., Cox, W. T. L., Brauer, M., & Devine, P. G. (2018, May 25). Little race or gender bias in an experiment of initial review of NIH R01 grant proposals. https://doi.org/10.31234/osf.io/r2xvb
